Tuesday, February 15, 2005

Routing manual in the works and example routing files

Posted by admin

Nicholas has started a manual to explain what Routing in Rails is all about and how you use it. It’s still very much a work in progress, but its an excellent start to learn more about Routing.

In addition, you can see the routes.rb definition for Basecamp and for a commerce application Mindel is working on.
